summary: Oblivion style castle added to the northwest of Northwatch keep... for people who downloaded the Skyblivion mod.
descriptionHtml:
Oblivion style castle added to the northwest of Northwatch keep... for people who downloaded the Skyblivion mod.


BE SO ADVISED:


""We've gotten a report on your Skyrim mod Anvil Style Castle. The report says that you're redistributing
Skyblivion assets. I have looked at your mod, and I know that it's only
an .esp, so it requires Skyblivion to work.


I think it would be helpful if you added a note on your description page
saying clearly that the mod requires Skyblivion to work. Hopefully,
that will put paid to anymore reports.


Thanks for your help on this.


All the best,


Jannifer

Nexus Moderator
"Most of our fears are tissue-paper thin, and a single bold step would carry us clear through them." ~ Brendan Behan
Â 
Semper in lumine ambulamus, sed non timere tenebras.""



AS IT IS CLEARLY STATED IN THE PRIOR STATEMENT BY A NEXUS MODERATOR THIS PLUGIN DOES NOT CONTAIN ANY OWNED ASSETS, AND AS I ALREADY MENTIONED IN THE PERMISSIONS SECTION SKYBLIVION IS NEEDED FOR THIS TO WORK.
author: 98UNAL
